name: Silent Destruction
overview: A shoot'em up, space invaders style game that was released as Odissea in Go Games n.8 (Aprile 1986). During an intergalactic journey flying your spaceship, you find yourself crossing an area dotted with asteroids that could damage your craft. To defend yourself, you must use your laser cannon to destroy them and thus clear your path. This mission will require all your reflexes, if you have any!
